scripts.build: npm run pid; npm run sed; anchor build
scripts.sed: shx --silent sed -i "s/EmPZGD34KDCtdwtqJU5VGoqidDQLyW1eyBXvj4yb2W9i/$(npm run pid)/g" Anchor.toml > '/dev/null' 2>&1; shx --silent sed -i "s/EmPZGD34KDCtdwtqJU5VGoqidDQLyW1eyBXvj4yb2W9i/$(npm run pid)/g" programs/vrf-client/src/lib.rs > '/dev/null' 2>&1;
scripts.pid: shx --silent find --name 'target/deploy/vrf_client-keypair.json' > '/dev/null' 2>&1 || solana-keygen new --no-bip39-passphrase --silent target/deploy/vrf_client-keypair.json; solana-keygen pubkey target/deploy/vrf_client-keypair.json
